Token.Abstract: Protocol description that allows arbitrary classes to define caching behavior for network output.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be invoked when the cache operation is completed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Informs the network instance whether or not this cache instance is capable of handling the output from the supplied action.

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: The action that is being processed.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the receiver is capable of caching this action, otherwise NO if the receiver should be skipped.

Token.Abstract: Allows classes conforming CSFNetworkOutputCache to auto-generate and return cache instances to network instances as-needed.

Parameter.Name: network
Parameter.Abstract: Network instance configuring its cache output instances.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Cache instance appropriate for the supplied network, or nil if this class doesn't have an instance available for the given network.Steps
